lines: saat samundar paar se
gudiyon ke baajaar se
achchheesee gudiya laana
gudiya chaahe na laana
paapa jaldee aa jaana
paapa jaldee aa jaana
rediyon par bhoolaabisara yah geet aa raha tha
pannaalaal ke kaanon ne suna
jaise spandan hua unake shareer mein
shabd jubaan par chale aae
vah laut aae geet ko ek naya rup dene rediyon par gaana to band ho gaya
aur pannaalaal ke mukh se bol svatah nikalane lage
saat samundar paar se
meree gudiya le aana
gudiyon ke baajaar se
meree gudiya le aana
beet gaee ab shaam suhaanee
meree gudiya ab huee begaanee
raah dikha de koee usako
meree chaahat bata de usako
meree gudiya le aana
meree gudiya le aana
veena jaldee aa jaana
vaana jalde aa jaana
aur vah phoot paden
bachchon kee tarah rone lage maan nirmala ne dekha
ye kya hua ye kis duniyaan mein vicharate hue baaten karane lage hai
hamen nahee jaanate
kisee ko nahee pahachaanate
bas bheetaraheebheetar jis gudiya ko pandrh varsho se yaad kar rahe hai
usee gudiya ke sapanon mein khoe rahate hai
usee gudiya kee jaise yaad hai unako
usee gudiya se milane kee chaah hai unakee
usee gudiya kee raah taak rahe hai
usee gudiya se milane ko betaab hai
aur vah gudiya apanee duniya mein apanee gudiyon se khel rahee hai unheen mein mast hai
unheen kee chinta hai
kaisa hai jeevan ek se do banate hai
do se chaar
aur chaar phir bant jaate hai apaneeapanee duniyaan basaane
apaneeapanee raah par chalane ko betaab
ek kee ginatee jahaan se shuru hotee hai us par koee vaapis nahin lautana chaahata
sabhee aage kee or dekhate hain
aur ek bechaara apanee pahachaan kee talaash mein bhatakata rahata hai
jaise yahaan pannaalaal bhatak rahe the
maan nirmala ne yahee sab likh diya veena ko
ant mein yahee likha ki veena tum mujhe bhool sakatee ho
sabako bhool sakatee ho lekin apane daideejee ko kaise bhool gaee ho jinhonne bachapan mein tumhen godee mein bitha kar bas pyaar hee diya hai
jinhonne kabhee tumase kuchh maanga hee nahin
bas duaen hee dee hai
unakee dua sun lo unakee dua jaan lo
unake praan tumhee mein tike hain
aakar unhen shaanti de do
maan ko dekho apanee bhaavanaon mein bahakar apane pati kee shaanti kee praarthana kar rahee thee vah
amit kee eemel padhakar veena bhaavuk ho gaee thee
lekin utar dete nahin ban pa raha tha
ek naukaree kee vyastata aur upar se bachchon kee dekhabhaal kee jimmedaaree mein doobee veena chaahakar bhee desh lautane kee nahin soch paatee thee
arun kee bhaavanaen to keval apane isee parivaar ke irdagird ghoomatee thee
use doosare sabhee begaane lagate the
usake beete din kee kahaaniyon ko sunakar usakee haanmenhaan milaane vaale use jarur apane lagate the
lekin aisa koee bhee use mila nahee
jab veena hee usake bahut pahale beet chuke bachapan se virakt bhaav rakhatee thee tab aur kaun mil sakata tha use hamadardee jataane bhar se upar saath dene vaala
bachchon kee samajh itanee nahee thee ki ve sab samajh sakate
unhen bhee apanee yahee duniyaan hee apanee lagatee thee
haan unakee maansee aaee thee
usase milakar unhen jarur achchha laga tha
lekin itanee alag thee unakee sabhyata aur sanskrati ki ve apanee maan ke apanon ko bilkul apana nahee samajh pa rahe the

unhen sab baaten naanaanaanee ke ghar kee maamaamaansee kee door kaheen unake parivaar kee baaten apane maan se sunee vaisee hee kahaaniyaan lagatee thee jaisee ve kisee kors kee kitaab mein padhate the
us par unhen to masheenon kee robortas kee staaravaar kee aur subah se shaam tak vyastata bharee jindagee kee kahaaniyaan hee achchhee lagatee thee
ve kya jaanen parivaar kee jadon mein racheebasee bhaavanaon ko unakee bhaavanaon mein sirph maan hotee hain jo bachchon ka khyaal rakhatee hai
unakee bhaavanaon mein ek baap hota hai jo bachchon ko hidaayaten deta hai
unakee sukhasuvidhaon ka dhyaan rakhana jisaka kartavy hai
us kartavy se yadi kabhee hatata hai ya hatane kee koshish karata hai to un bachchon ko apane adhikaaron ka pata hai
tabhee to veena kee jab kabhee apanee badee betee se takaraar ho jaatee to vah yahee kah kar veena ko chup kara detee thee ki kaalej jaane ke baad vah ghar aana pasand nahee karegee
vah hostal mein rahegee aur vahee kee hokar rah jaegee
aise mein veena ekadam saham jaatee thee
usane to apane bachapan mein aisa kabhee nahee socha tha
vah to bachapan se ab tak bhaavanaon ke sahaare jeetee rahee hai
sab saathasaath chalata hai usake usaka aaj in bachchon ke saath bandha hai
usaka beeta kal usakee yaadon mein basa hai
vah jabajab beete din yaad karatee hai unase seekh hee letee hai
apane aaj ko sanvaarane kee
apane aaj mein vah apane parivaar mein iseelie itana ram gaee hai ki usake beete dinon kee bhaavanaen usake beete kal kee yaaden hee use samajhaatee hai
ye bachche to apane aaj mein jeete hai
unhen usake beete kal se kya lena beeta kal to veena ka vahaan usake desh mein abhee bhee jeevant hai
beech kee ek kadee jo toot gaee thee vahee usakee dukhatee rag hai
vahee kabheekabhee use apane beete dinon se door rahane ko kahatee hai
us desh mein jaakar vah dev ke saath bitae kshanon ko punah jeevant dekh paegee
yah bhaav kabheekabhee aate hai usake man mein
lekin kshan bhar ke lie hee
vah saagar mein ek bulabule kee bhaanti uthate hain aur pal bhar mein vileen bhee ho jaate hai
aaj mein jeete use yadi koee yaad aa raha hai to vah usake daideejee vah bhee unase milane ko betaab ho chalee thee
apane aasapaas dekha usane
arun ko bata sakatee thee apanee ichchha
vahee kuchh kar sakata tha
bachcho kee chhuttiyaan aa rahee theen
ve bhee shaayad maan jaenge
vah bas jaegee unase milegee aur das din mein hee laut aaegee
man har dam sochata hee rahata hai
pal mein tola agale hee pal himaalay parvat ke vajan se bhee jyaada baat soch leta hai
ek pal titaleesa bana phoolaphool par mandaraata hai aur doosare hee pal pattharasa kathor bana nirmoheesa ek kinaare pada rah jaata hai
pal mein saat samundar kya aakaash ganga kee dooree maap leta hai aur agale hee pal ek kadam bhee usaka use bhaaree lagata hai
yah man hee hai jo jeevan ke saare khel khelata hai
yah man hee hai jo vaastav mein is jeevan ka khilaadee hai
veena ka man bhee sochata bahut hai
roj hee naee yojanaen banaata hai aur un yojanao ko poora karane ke sapane bhee leta hai
unhee mein ek yojana is varsh ke ant mein door usakee prateeksha mein aankhen gadhaaye baithe apane daidee se jaakar milane kee hai
vah apane daidee se milana chaahatee hai kyonki unake lie vah abhee bhee ek gudiya hai
theek vaisee hee gudiya jaisee vah apanee betee ko kahatee hai
jaise usakee donon betiyon se use prem hai vaise hee usake daidee usakee maan usase prem karate hai
un bhaavanao kee tay tak pahunch paana bhee isee man ka kaam hai
yah man dayaalu bhee naajuk bhee nishthur bhee nirmohee bhee
amit kee eemel se milee soch se abhee ubar bhee nahin paee thee ki maan kee chitthee mil gaee
ab to vah rone lagee
abhee jaana chaahatee hai vah
nahin jaegee to use usake daideejee kabhee nahin mil paenge
unhonne apanee betee se kabhee kuchh nahee maanga ab bhee nahin maang rahe
lekin is betee ko yaad bahut karate hai
kya maaloom usase milakar kuchh achchha lagane lage kya maaloom usase milakar apanee hosh mein laut aaen
lekin veena jo chaahatee hai vah kabhee nahin hota
usaka jaane ka utsaah ekaek thanda pad gaya
maan kee chitthee abhee haath mein hee thee ki phon kee ghantee baj uthee
doosaree or amit tha
bharraaye gale se bola deedee daidee nahin rahe vah aage kuchh nahin sun paee
phaphak uthee
amit haillohaillo karata rah gaya
doosaree or kaan lagae arun sun rah tha
ekadam chupasa ho gaya
amit kee haillo ka javaab nahin de paaya ekaek
kuchh pal phon mein amit kee aavaaj aatee rahee aur phir phon kat gaya
abhee bahut subah thee
bachche so rahe the
maan ka rona sun kar uth gae
ghabaraaye hue se unake kamare mein chale aae
ye kya hua maan ko poochha usake bete ne
tumhaare naanaajee ab nahee rahe
javaab mein arun ne dheere se kaha
teenon bachche maan se lipat gae
kuchh kahane laayak shabd nahee jaanate the
bas maan kee peeth thapathapaane lage
aansoo tham gae
lekin man ka rona nahee ruka
vah to bheetaraheebheetar rota raha
arun veena ke paas baitha raha
tarahatarah kee saantvana deta raha aur ant mein yahee bola lagata hai abhee jaana nahin likha hamaara indiya
jab bhee prograam banata hai kuchh na kuchh gadabad ho jaatee hai abhee apanee maan ko phon kar lo
unase baat kar lo
aur unhen yahaan aakar mil jaane ko kah do
veena ne koee utar nahee diya
chup rahana hee behatar samajha
man usaka yahee soch raha tha ki yah moh usake pati arun ka aur svayan usaka apane bachcho ke prati itana adhik jakada hua hai usake saath ki us jakadan se nikal paana saral nahin
bhaavanao ka toophaan thoda thama to veena ne maan se baat karane ko nambar mila liya
udhar prem ne phon uthaaya tha
veena kee aavaaj pahachaan kar usane usase ek hee prashn kiya deedee daidee kee teharaveen tak kya aap aa jaengee
veena itana hee javaab de paee nahee prem abhee aana nahee ho sakega
meree maan se baat karao
maan nirmala ne phon liya lekin sirph veena kahakar subukane lagee
veena bhee apanee rulaee nahin rok paee
bas itana bolee mera man tha bahut daidee se milane ko
par unhonne mera intajaar nahin kiya
maan ab tum mere paas chalee aao
mere saath rahana tum
jaise aur sabhee ko tyaag diya hai veena ne apane parivaar kee khaatir
maan hee rah gaee hai vahaan aur achchha hoga vahee chalee aae
veena kee baat ka maan ne utar nahee diya
bas yahee bolee tujhe yaad karate hue hee chale gae
kisee se kuchh nahee kaha
koee kasht nahee diya hamako
veena maan se baat kam kar pa rahee thee
aansoo the ki maan kee aavaaj sunate hee bahane lage the jo ki ab rukane ka naam nahee le rahe the
tab bolee maan se maan mai tumhen patr likhoongee
jaldee hee
tum apana dhyaan rakhana
tab veena ne ek ek karake apanee bahanon se baat kee
geeta se baat huee to usane kah diya deedee aap kyon kat gaee saare parivaar se sab yahaan hai sirph aapakee kamee khal rahee hai
aisee bhee kya bandish hai jo apane pati va bachchon ke siva kuchh nahin soojhata aapako
geeta ko laga ki jaise veena ne usakee baat sunee aur utar nahin diya
ekaek phon kaat diya
veena ke paas utar tha bhee aur nahee bhee lekin phon usane nahee kaata arun ne jo doosare phon ko kaan se lagae tha aage badhakar phon kaat diya
veena ne prashn bharee drashti se use dekha to vah bola ek hee baat hai sabakee jubaan par chalee aao chalee aao aur kuchh nahee
koee nahee samajhana chaahata ki yah jindagee itanee aasaan nahee hai jeena yahaan
veena ne usakee baat ka koee utar nahin diya
chup rahana hee behatar samajha usane
raat der gae vah maan ko likhane baith gaee
meree pyaaree maan
dherasa pyaar
mai apane priy daideejee se unake antim samay mein bhee nahin mil paee isaka mujhe duhkh hai
vakt bahut jaldee beet gaya
jeevan ko suchaaru banaane mein parivaar kee dekhabhaal mein
ek sapana jo ham sabaka tha jisamen tum bhee theen daidee bhee the aur mere sabhee bhaeebahan bhee the vah sapana tha ki sabaka apanaapana parivaar ho

sabakee jindagee kee gaadee dhang se chalatee rahe aur main tumhaaree betee apanee is gaadee ko chalaatechalaate apane astitv mein itana talleen ho gaee ki mujhe apane maanbaap kee bhee sudh nahee rahee
sirph main hee nahee maan har aurat kitanee aashaavaadee hotee hai apane jeevan kee har subah ko vah naeesubah ka darja detee hai
har naee subah vah ek nae sapane ko janm detee hai
har roj usakee naee pahachaan banatee hai

aur har naee subah se usakee aankhen isee prateeksha mein lagee rahatee hain ki kab usake usake parivaar ke sapane saakaar honge kab vah poornata ko praapt hogee maan main bhee in sapanon se apane ko alag nahin kar paee
tumhen tumhaare parivaar ko dekhakar tumase mile sanskaaron ko paakar mera bhee yahee rup ban gaya hai
apane bachapan se javaanee tak mainne har subah yahee sapana tumhaaree aankhon mein palata dekha tha
kitanee tanmayata se tum apane parivaar ke kalyaan mein jutee rahatee theen tumhen kabhee apane sukh kee chinta mein sirph apanee bhaavanaon mein jakade nahin dekha tha
tumhaaree chinta tumhaaree bhaavana sirph ek thee jo tumhaare parivaar tumhaare bachchon ke kalyaan se judee thee
tum har dam apane bachchon kee chinta mein magn rahatee theen
unheen kee khushee mein tum khushee paatee theen
unheen ke kasht tumhen apane lagate the
aise mein tum hamaaree naanee ko saantvana dekar yahee kahatee theen na ki maan meree chinta na karo
mere bachche khush hai to main khush hoon
tum isee se khush raho ki tumhaaree betee unheen mein magn usee duniyaan mein prasann hai
aise mein hamane kitane varsh to tumhen daidee se door is tapasya mein rat dekha tha
aaj mera bhee yahee haal hai
main jaisee bhee hoon achchhee hoon
arun jaisa hai achchha hai
jo soch hai usakee usase aage kuchh nahee soch sakata
pati banakar aaya vah mere jeevan mein to sirph in bachcho ke lie
isake ilaava kuchh bhee nahee hai
hamaare vichaar hamaaree soch hamaaree sahanashakti sab ek doosare se bhinn hain
lekin yah jab tab samajh aata der ho chukee thee
aise mein apane jeevan se samajhauta kar liya maine
aur kya karatee bachchon kee duniyaan mein mast ho gaee
mera dhyey ek hai sirph apane bachchon ka kalyaan
mera sapana ek hai ki mere bachche bade ho jaen apane pairo par khade ho jaen
aise mein maan mujhe ye saat samundar paar kee dooree tumase saat janm door lagatee hai
ise dooree se kabheekabhee dard bhee hota hai man bahut karata hai lekin mere bachcho kee khushahaalee use chhipa letee hai apane hee bheetar
mainne maan apane kashton mein kathinaiyon mein sirph sukh kee talaash kee hai
mujhe har bhaav mein sukh mil jaata hai aur yah sukh mujhe bahut achchha lagata hai
aur kya likhoon meree or se sabhee ko yathaayogy kahana
agalee garmiyon mein main tumhen yahaan bula loongee
prem se kahana vah tumhaara paasaport taiyaar karava le
apanee dherasee pyaar bharee bhaavanaon ke saath
tumhaaree betee
veena
patr band karake usane apane sirahaane rakh liya
soch subah aaphis jaate vah svayan daak mein daal degee
din bhar kee thakaan se usakee aankhen svayan jhapak gaee aur vah so gaee
apane jeevan kee agalee naee subah ke aane kee prateeksha usake man ne shuru kar dee thee
